content.content: https://makerdao.com/en/  1111418×377 184 KB     Oasis    Oasis.app Borrow Dai, a USD pegged Stablecoin, or multiply your exposure using crypto as your collateral       222987×226 153 KB

Hi @gqvizyckso This is not really a contradiction, Dai is available for anyone. The Dai token can never be censored by anyone. However, Frontend products like Oasis.app that is delivered by a distinct business entity have to adhere to the legal framework they are operating in, or face severe consequences which ultimately may mean they are being shut down. Adhering to regulatory requirements to block sanctioned countries is an example of things Oasis.app has to do to stay operating for the rest of the world.
Not sure if it’s also blocked in your country but defisaver might be the way to go if you want to open a vault. Or, if you just want to trade crypto for DAI, Uniswap is an option.

NO ONE can ever censor your DAI. As long as they are in your custody and under your control. I believe that in addition to DEFISAVER, you can use ZAPPER or Intadapp to open a vault. I recommend Instadapp, it’s a bit more intuitive and has good extra features.
